title: After a lot of work to get my account back riot takes away 3 of my champs
body:
So this is a long story but ill try to make it as short as possible this also isn't a ploy to get my refund tokens back, this actually happened.
I got hacked and it wasn't too bad, I got my account back and everything was ok except whoever hacked me also used up my refund tokens. This wouldn't have been an issue if Kled had been a better champion in my mind. So I put in a request to help with that and get my account back in order and I waited a few days. After a few days had passed (Today) I got an email back and they said they had rolled back my account. So I got on thinking I had my refund tokens back, when really I had lost 10 RP and I thought no big deal but I went onto the page where you can look at your refund tokens and they were all gone and I scrolled down and saw that Diana, Olaf, and Nidalee had all been refunded but I had received no RP ( I had purchased Diana, and Olaf with RP) I got the IP from Nidalee but I wasn't as worried about that because I suck as Nidalee. I enjoyed playing Diana and had even earned a Hextech chest as her, Olaf I don't really care about but that is off topic. So I went a submitted a ticked under Technical Issues, and I was wondering if that was the best place to enter the ticket as I no longer had any issues with recovering my account, I also would greatly appreciate it if you could tell me if you have had any issues like it.

replies.body:
We'd like to help with this and see if er can provide any further reparations!  Our account team will need to look at your specific case individually and review the situation through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  It's okay if you selected Technical, we'll get you to the right place.  

I looked into this for you as well, and confirmed that your ticket has been received.  It's best not to reply to your ticket until you receive a response, otherwise you may be bumped back down to the bottom.  We'll respond asap!

Ok thank you so much I am really confused about his whole situation and have been since my account was hacked and you responding so quickly really helped me have a bit more faith in riot as it has taken 2-3 days for my other tickets to get processed
